title: New: Shaky Snakes – Blue Seven
content:
Ian Allan Johnston‘s moniker Shaky Snakes appears in the front line once again with stunning new track Blue Seven. The Portland based producer draws an experimental late night disco groovin’ line, merged with a kraut-inspired balearic experience and a beat to kill for. Balancing somewhere between the ’70s kosmische futurism and Lindstrom‘s galloping vibes, with Blue Seven, Shaky Snakes establishes himself as a name to keep an eye out for in 2014.
